title: shyAm AyE man
sahitya:
shym AyE man behalAyE


anupallavi

  bAdal jaise Anand barastE nand kishOr nAchkE AyE


caraNam    ghar ghar chOri huyI makhankI bhar gayE manmOhankE 
AnE sE chArOn aur bajAyE badhAyiyAn
			(madhyamakAla)
sArE gOkul sajAyE lAl sE rachAyE hOli sab nAchE nArAyan guN gAtE shubh pAtE
